mapper.select: SELECT project_id AS projectId, project_name AS projectName, seller AS seller, private_key AS privateKey, public_key AS publicKey, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM bb_alipay WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bb_alipay (project_id, project_name, seller, private_key, public_key) VALUE (#{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{seller}, #{privateKey}, #{publicKey})
